mapper.sql: f_count_check_id, order_id, check_item, sample, check_number, unqualify, qualify, cdate, measure_data, emp_id, result, note
mapper.insert:
insert into final_count_check
f_count_check_id,
order_id,
check_item,
sample,
check_number,
unqualify,
qualify,
cdate,
measure_data,
emp_id,
result,
note,

mapper.update:
update final_count_check
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_item = #{checkItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sample = #{sample,jdbcType=INTEGER},
check_number = #{checkNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
unqualify = #{unqualify,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qualify = #{qualify,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cdate = #{cdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
measure_data = #{measureData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_id = #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where f_count_check_id = #{fCountCheckId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update final_count_check set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_item = #{checkItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sample = #{sample,jdbcType=INTEGER}, check_number = #{checkNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unqualify = #{unqualify,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qualify = #{qualify,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cdate = #{cdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, measure_data = #{measureData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_id = #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where f_count_check_id = #{fCountCheckId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT final_count_check.f_count_check_id as fCountCheckId , final_count_check.order_id as orderId, final_count_check.check_item as checkItem, final_count_check.sample as sample, final_count_check.check_number as checkNumber, final_count_check.unqualify as unqualify, final_count_check.qualify as qualify, final_count_check.cdate as cdate, final_count_check.measure_data as measureData, final_count_check.emp_id as empId, final_count_check.result as result, final_count_check.note as note, employee.emp_name as empName FROM final_count_check,employee WHERE final_count_check.emp_id=employee.emp_id limit #{page} , #{rows}

SELECT final_count_check.f_count_check_id as fCountCheckId , final_count_check.order_id as orderId, final_count_check.check_item as checkItem, final_count_check.sample as sample, final_count_check.check_number as checkNumber, final_count_check.unqualify as unqualify, final_count_check.qualify as qualify, final_count_check.cdate as cdate, final_count_check.measure_data as measureData, final_count_check.emp_id as empId, final_count_check.result as result, final_count_check.note as note, employee.emp_name as empName FROM final_count_check,employee WHERE final_count_check.emp_id=employee.emp_id and final_count_check.f_count_check_id like CONCAT('%',#{id},'%') limit #{page} , #{rows}
select count(*) from final_count_check where f_count_check_id like CONCAT('%',#{id},'%')

SELECT final_count_check.f_count_check_id as fCountCheckId , final_count_check.order_id as orderId, final_count_check.check_item as checkItem, final_count_check.sample as sample, final_count_check.check_number as checkNumber, final_count_check.unqualify as unqualify, final_count_check.qualify as qualify, final_count_check.cdate as cdate, final_count_check.measure_data as measureData, final_count_check.emp_id as empId, final_count_check.result as result, final_count_check.note as note, employee.emp_name as empName FROM final_count_check,employee WHERE final_count_check.emp_id=employee.emp_id and final_count_check.order_id like CONCAT('%',#{orderId},'%') limit #{page} , #{rows}
select count(*) from final_count_check where order_id like CONCAT('%',#{orderId},'%')
